cs213.photoAlbum.control

Interface ControlInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Control

    public interface ControlInterface

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String addPhoto(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String albumName)
      Calls global User user method to get Album with name albumName Calls Album method to add Photo with filename filename
      void addPhoto(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String caption, java.lang.String albumName)
      Calls global User user method to get Album with name albumName Calls Album method to add Photo with filename filename and caption caption This is the method to use when a photo is being added to the user's system for the first time
      void addTag(java.lang.String filename, Tag tag)
      Calls global User user method to get Photo of name filename Adds tag to Photo
      void addUser(java.lang.String userID, java.lang.String username)
      Does typechecking for input arguments, Calls backend method that adds a new user to the system
      void clearUsers()
      Calls backend clear method to delete all users from the system
      void createAlbum(java.lang.String name)
      Does typechecking for input arguments Calls method in global User user that adds new album with name name
      void deleteAlbum(java.lang.String name)
      Does typechecking for input arguments Calls method in global User user that deletes album with name name
      void deleteTag(java.lang.String filename, Tag tag)
      Calls global User user method to get Photo of name filename Adds tag to Photo with type type and value value
      void deleteUser(java.lang.String userID)
      Does typechecking for input arguments, Calls backend method that deletes user from system
      java.util.List<Photo> getPhotosByDate(java.util.Calendar start, java.util.Calendar end)
      Calls global User user method to get Photo of name filename with Calendar dateAndTime between Calendar start and Calendar end
      java.util.List<Photo> getPhotosByTag(java.util.List<Tag> tags)
      Calls global User user method to get Photo objects with all of the tags in tags
      java.lang.String getUserID()
      Returns id of currently logged-in user
      java.lang.String getUserName()
      Returns name of currently logged-in user
      java.util.Collection<Album> listAlbums()
      Calls backend method to serve up user Albums
      Photo listPhotoInfo(java.lang.String filename)
      Calls global User user method to get Photo of name filename Adds tag to Photo with type type and value value
      java.util.List<Photo> listPhotos(java.lang.String albumName)
      Lists photos in Album albumName of User
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> listUsers()
      Calls backend method that lists users in system
      void login(java.lang.String userID)
      Does typechecking for input arguments, Calls backend method to serve up user data if user exists
      void logout()
      Calls backend method to write data of global User user
      void movePhoto(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String oldAlbum, java.lang.String newAlbum)
      Calls global User user method to get Album with name oldAlbum, Calls Album method to delete Photo with filename filename from oldAlbum, Calls global User user method to get Album with name newAlbum, Calls Album method to add Photo with filename filename to newAlbum
      void removePhoto(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String albumName)
      Calls global User user method to get Album with name albumName Calls Album method to delete Photo with filename filename from Album with albumName
